TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Linkify extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Linkify take a piece of text and a regular expression and turns all of the regex matches in the text into clickable links.

Docs.param: Spannable whose text is to be marked-up with links
Regex pattern to be used for finding links
Url scheme string (eg http:// to be prepended to the url of links that do not have a scheme specified in the link text
Docs.summary: Applies a regex to a Spannable turning the matches into links.
